result.arabic_text: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلَهُۥ جَزَآءً ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۖ وَسَنَقُولُ لَهُۥ مِنۡ أَمۡرِنَا يُسۡرٗا
result.translation: 88. Kaadu keenik isi Rabbil yeemeneeh meqe taama abbaasite numuh tu-gactek, toysa usuk Yallak meqe galto-le (jannat kinnuk), kaadu nanu addunyal Ni- caagiidak duude waam maxcoo kee abinak kaal mahaynaay kaal xabbacoysenno iyye.
